trans-unit.source: Creates a user-selectable list of ActiveX® Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names.
trans-unit.target: 创建.NET Framework (ADO.NET) 提供程序名称的用户可选择列表 ActiveX® 数据对象 (ADO)。

trans-unit.source: The DataProviderNameConverter class is a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> object that is typically referenced by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: DataProviderNameConverter 类是<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>通常由引用的对象<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>

trans-unit.source: The names that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method are of ADO.NET providers, from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A> method, that create data objects.
trans-unit.target: 通过返回名称<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法是的 ADO.NET 提供程序，从<xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A>方法，用于创建数据对象。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the returned provider names are an exclusive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>方法获取一个值，该值指示是否返回提供程序名称是否为可能的值的独占列表。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A> method gets a value indicating whether the returned provider names are a standard set of values that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A>方法获取一个值，该值指示返回的提供程序名称是否为可以从列表中选取的值的标准集。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValuesSupported%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter> class when the class is referenced by a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter>类引用类时<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute>属性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter>

trans-unit.source: Returns a list of the available ActiveX® Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names.
trans-unit.target: 返回列表的可用 ActiveX® 数据对象 (ADO) 的.NET Framework (ADO.NET) 提供程序名称。

trans-unit.source: The GetStandardValues method uses the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A> method to return a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object containing the ADO.NET provider names.
trans-unit.target: GetStandardValues 方法使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A>方法以返回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象，其中包含的 ADO.NET 提供程序名称。</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactories.GetFactoryClasses%2A>

trans-unit.source: It converts this <xref:System.Data.DataTable> to a string array, and then converts this array to a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: 它将此转换<xref:System.Data.DataTable>到一个字符串数组，然后将此数组到<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>对象。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is not used by the GetStandardValues.
trans-unit.target: `context` GetStandardValues 不使用参数。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，实现<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，以便可以执行转换，则类型转换器提供有关类型转换器的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing the names of the available ADO.NET providers.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>包含可用的 ADO.NET 提供程序的名称。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the returned ActiveX® Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names are an exclusive list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否返回 ActiveX® 数据对象 (ADO) 的.NET Framework (ADO.NET) 提供程序名称是否为可能的值的独占列表。

trans-unit.source: If you derive a class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter> class and override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method to return an exclusive list of ADO.NET provider names, also override the GetStandardValuesExclusive method to return `true` when the provider name list is exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生的类从<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter>类并重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>方法以返回 ADO.NET 提供程序名称的独占列表还重写 GetStandardValuesExclusive 方法以返回`true`时提供程序名称列表是独占的。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataProviderNameConverter>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is not used by the GetStandardValuesExclusive.
trans-unit.target: `context` GetStandardValuesExclusive 不使用参数。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，实现<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，以便可以执行转换，则类型转换器提供有关类型转换器的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this object returns a standard set of ActiveX® Data Objects (ADO) for the .NET Framework (ADO.NET) provider names that can be picked from a list.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此对象是否从列表中返回的标准集 ActiveX® 数据对象 (ADO) 可以选取的.NET Framework (ADO.NET) 提供程序名。

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is not used by the GetStandardValuesSupported method.
trans-unit.target: `context` GetStandardValuesSupported 方法不使用参数。

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides information about a context to a type converter so that the type converter can perform a conversion.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，实现<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> ，以便可以执行转换，则类型转换器提供有关类型转换器的上下文信息。

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
